name: Creep (Part One of Two)
description:
Creep is an RPG about an unstable man living in a society. Survive the Paranormal with Turn-Based combat and discover the main character's mysterious past.
This is Part 1 of 2. When both parts are done it will be one game. It will still be free when the game is complete. If you like it, please support my friend Waveman AV, who let me use all of his music for this game. 

Waveman & The Wizard - YouTube
Waveman AV - YouTube
Stream Waveman music | Listen to songs, albums, playlists for free on SoundCloud
Music | Waveman (bandcamp.com)

Additional Resources
-PXL Pack by CrackedGhostGames
-Nostalgia Graphics Pack by Ocean’s Dream
-RMB Graphics Pack by William Craig Ramsey
-Computer Music by The Minute Hour

Do not play if you have epilepsy or seizures triggered by flashing lights. The game also contains strong adult language and themes as well as blood and gore.
Special thanks to Bark, TotalTonix and Waveman for testing my game.
